title: Oh, That Shotgun Sky
description: Days after the Boundary falls, six strangers converge in a one-horse town, all of them on the run. Some from the past, some avoiding the future.When men from Shine Company arrive to reclaim their own, these desperate travelers have to decide if they stand with the law, or against it. Men pull the trigger and blood spills.Fate pulls the strings and everybody dances.
author: Sarah Chorn
